nodes.text: The Gemon-4 was a large model of ion engine manufactured by Cygnus Spaceworks for use on Imperial-class Star Destroyers as emergency drives. Such served the same purpose aboard the Final Order's Xyston-class Star Destroyers.
In Star Wars Legends, Gemon-4 ion engines were first identified in The Galactic Empire—Ships of the Fleet pop-up book. They were identified in canon in the book Ultimate Star Wars.
